heading: Join GetUp Crew
subhead: Become the driving force of our movement with a regular contribution
body:
GetUp Crew members are the backbone of our movement. Your regular support allows us to plan long-term campaigns, respond quickly to breaking issues, and build the movement power we need to create lasting change.

As a Crew member, you'll be part of a community of Australians who are committed to creating a fair, flourishing, and just Australia for all.

benefits.heading: Strategic Impact
benefits.body: Your regular donations allow us to plan and execute long-term campaigns that create systemic change.

benefits.heading: Rapid Response
benefits.body: When urgent issues arise, we can act immediately without waiting for fundraising drives.

benefits.heading: Movement Building
benefits.body: Regular support helps us invest in organizing, training, and empowering members across Australia.

benefits.heading: Independence
benefits.body: Member contributions keep us accountable to our community, not corporate interests.

testimonial.quote: Being part of GetUp Crew means I'm making a difference every single month. It's my way of investing in the Australia I want to see.
testimonial.author: Sarah M.
